name: TruckyLove
overview:
TruckyLove is designed to allow food truck owners and mobile vendors to share their location and business information with their customers - in real time!

Our app provides local consumers with a live map to see who is open for business in their area. It’s like Google Maps for mobile vendors!

In order to ensure your business shows up on the map you will need to do the following:

Sign up and create your unique TruckyLove vendor profile Add your business info, link up your social media accounts and upload a logo Own a GPS enabled smartphone like iPhone or Android. 3G/4G iPads work too Once you have met these requirements, you are all set.

When you are ready to share your location and announce to the locals that you are open for business, get your smartphone out and follow these steps:

Open your phones web browser (Safari, Chrome or Firefox) Type www.truckylove.com into the address bar Sign in to TruckyLove Set the timer to the number of hours you will be open for business Press the “Start Broadcasting” button! Congratulations! You are now broadcasting live from wherever you are!
